text: Very experienced and polite Uncle! Redrilled my old ball because he noticed the span was too long and subsequently upgraded my ball to the new 900 Global Reality Solid! Uncle James even took the effort to see me bowl with it and gave me pointers. Looking forward to my second arsenal from him!
Uncle James' services are top-notch. Very reasonable prices and always easy to communicate!

Prices are highly affordable, got one of my fingerholes replugged here and even helped me re-glue my other hole as it was slightly peeling off without extra charges! Very polite and easygoing as well. Thank you uncle James!
Boss was very professional and friendly. Offered some good advice to me and definitely recommended a wonderful ball which I'm addicted to till now hahaha
The best bowling pro shop in Singapore with best price & deals! Definitely recommend anyone buying their bowling equipment from this shop!
